segments.text: I see the kitchen is bustling with quiet chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, completely oblivious to the water cascading from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a puddle forming at her feet, growing larger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the tidy garden outside and this mess inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel sorry for the woman, so lost in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is trying to grab cookies, but he looks like he could tumble off that stool any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl next to him seems eager, almost pleading for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how carefree they are, as if they’re on a secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a ticking clock before something goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me wants to shout out a warning, but then I think about how it might ruin their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
